entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. A few flurries beginning early this evening and ending near midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
